usefulItems: cling film, baking tray (approx. 40 cm x 35 cm), oven
title: Potato Pizza with Vegetables - Pizza di patate con verdure

ingredients.content: 100 g potatoes, peeled, cut in pieces (2-3 cm)
20 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for greasing
10 g extra virgin olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
80 g yellow peppers, cut in pieces (1-2 cm)
80 g red peppers, cut in pieces (1-2 cm)
50 g courgettes, cut in pieces (1-2 cm)
100 g aubergines, cut in pieces (1-2 cm)
300 g white button mushrooms, fresh, sliced
4 - 6 fresh basil leaves, shredded, plus extra for garnish

preparations.content: Grease a large baking tray with plenty of oil.
Place potatoes in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 4.5<b>. Scrape down sides and base of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add 150 g water and cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add 150 g water, salt, oil, flour and yeast. Wait for temperature to cool to 60°C then knead <b>3 min/<b>.
Add remaining 20 g water and knead again <b>1 min/<b> (the dough should be quite soft).
Tip dough out onto prepared baking tray and spread into a rectangle over the whole tray using the tips of your fingers. Cover with cling film (see tip) and leave to rise for 1 hour.
Towards the end of this time, preheat oven to 200°C.
Place oil, vegetables and salt in mixing bowl then cook <b>6 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Drain cooked vegetables through simmering basket then arrange over pizza. Sprinkle with shredded basil leaves and bake for 20-30 minutes (200°C) until cooked.
Drizzle with a little extra oil and scatter with extra basil leaves, before serving hot, cut in slices.

hintsAndTricks: The humble potato is a popular pizza topping across Italy. A great example of traditional peasant food, many recipes combine thinly sliced potatoes with fresh herbs and a drizzle of olive oil for a filling and inexpensive family meal. In southern Italy, potatoes are used in the dough itself. Cooked, mashed potatoes are combined with yeast and flour to make a tender crust that can be topped with any ingredients.
Sprinkle over mozzarella cubes or other cheese before baking in <b>step 8<b>.
Lightly grease cling film to prevent it from sticking to the dough during the resting and leavening stages.
